titles.title: A bill to amend section 18 of the United States Housing Act of 1937, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S11895, S11897-11898)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 8/16/1994--Introduced. Amends the United States Housing Act of 1937 to revise provisions regarding the demolition and disposition of public housing, including: (1) conditions for waiver of the "one-for-one" replacement rule; and (2) tenant consultation and relocation assistance.
